function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases transmission due to crowded physical spaces","Impact":"Risk of disease spread among people in close proximity","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people in the space, improving ventilation and air circulation, promoting personal hygiene practices","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, air purifiers, germicidal ultraviolet (GUV) systems","People":"Occupants of the physical spaces","Owner":"Designers, building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inefficient airflow patterns leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Optimizing airflow patterns, installing air purifiers and ventilation systems, promoting use of face masks","Technologies":"CFD simulation software, airflow visualization tools, HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of the physical spaces","Owner":"Designers, building managers, HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Insufficient lighting creating discomfort and health risks","Impact":"Strain on the eyes, reduced visibility, and potential impact on mental well-being","Mitigation":"Proper lighting design, use of natural light, ergonomic lighting fixtures","Technologies":"Lighting simulation software, occupancy sensors, daylight harvesting systems","People":"Occupants of the physical spaces","Owner":"Designers, building managers, lighting consultants"}]}
